body:
h1. CoffeeMod

Hacked Coffee Maker for CampZone 2012 (the biggest outside LAN-party). We are working on an Arduino based coffeemaker controller (max. 10 liter coffee pot). So we can monitor how much coffee is made during the event.

!http://f.cl.ly/items/2N1A113m0b0G2p340W1T/photo.JPG(controller)!
